NOT ALL DIXIE PERSONS AGAINST


MARTIN LUTHER KING HONOR

Playing chess by mail is old
stuff, but now they're bowling by
transatlantic telephone. A Chi
cago champion took a one-game
match with an opponent in Bir-
mingham, England. The phone
hook-up was tied into public adj
dress systems at both locations
so spectators could follow the
match, even hearing the pins fall.

Experienced model builders
like to come up with something
unique by combining parts from
several different kits. The 1884
Ford kit produced by Monogram
forms the basis for custom-built
competition coupe. Chop the top
and add the rear wheels and tires
and the four wheel covers from
Monogram's Black Widow kit.
Finish up with the nose section,
radiator grill, door handles, push
bar and racing numbers from the
Midget Racer. Warning: when
you combine kits, be sure they're
all in the same scale.

and a cigarette clenched between
his or her teeth, Mr.. Mrs, or
Miss America waited for some
long awaited tobacco findings
from the federal health agency.


AS If we we're ignorant of the
causes of many coughs and res
piratory ailments, the federal re-
port was made public. News re-
porters gave the smokers a puff
by puff summary. Some Of the
reporters were at the time being
paid by purveyors of the very
weeds they we're denouncing.


Smokers Of cigarettes we're
warned that they are literally
smoking their paths into early
departures from this world. Some
scientists say smokers lives are
shortened by eight years in COM
parison to non smokers. Cigar
cites contain harmful tars and
nicotine and naturally the haze
of smoke Is hardly good for what
ails you.


My husband and ! have fol-
lowed the anti-smoking campaign
launched by the British govern
ment. All reports show that in
spite of an active all out drive
against the demon weeds
wrapped in understanding re-
mains at a terrific pace in Great
Britain.


In the United States smoking
cigarettes have evolved from the
smoking parlor to the living
room, yea. the bedroom. Cigar
cites have been glamorized as
herman s pride and a sexy fe-
males desire.


The shredded leaves are mixed
and blended to suit not only a
sultan s palate, but also to fit
a business executive S taste. Gig
gies have been renamed from
lowly animal (camel) to the high
sounding Marlboro. Even a clean
taste Is suggested by Spring and
Lucky Strike is seldom heard
as often as Winston or Kool.


Cigarette manufacturers
rushed headlong into a filter
game. They produced menthol
ones. They turned out filter
ones. Some used tiny spirals of
clean paper, others used web
fibers--all we're trying to make
their products clinically pure.


Filters we're put up front, fill
tiers we're brown, filters we're
recessed, but the final ingred-
ient--tobacco was changed very
little.


When Carrie Nation and others
we're fighting John Barleycorn-
an insidious little product--a Gig
arctic was putting its way into
the American way Of life. AS
women gained equal status, they
adopted the light and puff rou-
tines of the male smokers. Wom-
en- have without a doubt caused
the cigarette industry to flourish.


Pipe smokers Jared better in
the government report. Cigar
buffers also we're given little
space. The snuff dippers or
brushers rated nothing.


Between the cigarette smok-
ers, the exhaust from automo-
biles and the fumes from indus
trial plants there Is little hope
for an end to the evergrowing
smog problem. Smokers are here
70 stay


Regardless of the govern
ment s report or the attempts to
halt the million dollar tobacco
industry from finding more ways
Of enticing more smokers an
nually--the huffing and putting
will continue. 1t will remain a

then Asia. There is much trouble bTe1Oing

to sQuiYna and nOaO it is another small country

Panama occupies q unique position IN the
history Of this country. Through the Canal
Zones, which aOas leased on a hn1itleSS plan,
the United States is a virtual 0uvaeY Of part
OF foreign nation.


For several years the leaders Of Panama
haze objected to U0YiOuS measures of flag
flying and protocol. other obje ctions concern
ing equal pay Of Panananiaas and Americans
engaged in our governmental or the Canal
Zone projects we're loudly Voiced


Rioting caused by q flag raising episode by
American students resulted In several deaths
and q major crisis once more faces us in this
hemisphere. 1t IS time for our president and
secretary of state to apply some international
relations tie claniques TOWARD the Latin AnaeYi
can countries.
TROUBLE IN PANAMA

The dilemma acing the school districts Of
Arizona has reached the illustration point. The
schools enrolment esbe cially in MaTicob0 and
Pima counties are suybasS sing all predictions.
Taxbaying property Owners in some Of the
school districts haze been taxed until they
are at the point of rebellion.


There has been a tukeWaTW effort every
legis lathe year for some while to TeU0mb
the states tax assessment program and ale
mate the property Owners. Each session sees
nothing formulate but more proposals ON top of
old ones.


A sound tax equalization tax program wos
one of the five major items announced by Co..
Paul Fan,ain in his opening address, to the ATi-
zo,sa Legis latuye. Let US push the tax eQa0h-
cation program this year until a successful
formula is found.
